filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello, this is 6 Minute English from BBC Learning English. I'm Phil.And I'm Beth.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Well, in this program, we're going to be talking about the PISA rankings.The rankings are based on tests carried out by the OECD. That's an international organization every three years. The tests attempt to show which countries are the most effective at teaching maths, science and reading. But is that really possible to measure?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Well, here is former BBC education correspondent, Sean Coughlin, talking to BBC World Service program, The Global Story.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: The first PISA tests were contentious because not everyone believed it was fair to compare very different countries.Phil, I've got a question for you about them.So in 2022, Singapore was top of the reading rankings.But which of these countries came second?Was it A, the USA, B, Ireland, or C, the UK?I think it might be B, Ireland.OK.Well, we will find out if that's correct at the end
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: of the program.A common pattern in the PISA rankings is that the most successful countries tend to be smaller.Talking to BBC World Service program, The Global Story, Sean Coughlin tells us that many large countries from Western Europe don't score that highly in the rankings.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: We heard that many large European countries are being outpaced by smaller nations.If someone outpaces you, they're going faster than you, at a higher pace.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: We also heard that smaller nations are outperforming larger ones.They're performing better.Singapore, Estonia and Taiwan are described as economic rivals to large European nations.That means that they are competing with them economically.We also heard about a knowledge economy.This is an economy based on service industries that require workers to be highly educated, such as IT, finance or advanced engineering.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: So what makes countries perform better in these tests?Let's hear again from BBC World Service program, The Global Story.Sean Coughlin tells us that those countries that prioritize getting everyone to a certain level do well.We also hear from Rando Kustic, an Estonian school principal.Countries which make sure that all their pupils get through a certain level of education to a certain standard, regardless of their
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json
RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Rando Kustic said that Estonian schools do not want to segregate students.Segregate means to separate and keep apart.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Okay, let's recap the vocabulary we've learnt in this program about education rankings, starting with contentious, argued about or controversial.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: If something happens regardless of a second thing, the second thing has no impact on it happening.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json

chunks.chunk_text: There are more trending topics and useful vocabulary here at 6 Minute English.Goodbye for now.Bye.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json
RSS_262026947_podcast_1304_Which country has the best schools_.json
